pullrequest.title: SDF Spec tutorial: Visuals and Collisions

content.raw: I wonder if we should move all the detail about the `<material>` tag to an intermediate tutorial and let the previous sections stand alone? We could then make a separate intermediate or advanced tutorial about the `<surface>` tag
content.html: I wonder if we should move all the detail about the <material> tag to an intermediate tutorial and let the previous sections stand alone? We could then make a separate intermediate or advanced tutorial about the <surface> tag
